content: leave stitches unworked and return to them at a later point please note each arm and the body are begun with the rs of your work facing you whereas with the 2nd leg it is started with the ws facing you the row count is done as a single count throughout the piece of work you will notice that the row count for the second arm counts off the same row numbers as the first to make it clearer which piece you are on it is proceeded by a letter this sounds super complicated but should make complete sense as you follow the pattern i really really hope at last you have made it through to the
